page.title: 12ECOLOGY
page.content: In the Lanark area there are a number of people activally involved in preserving the {Ecology}.The majority of these people are involved in the {Scottish Wildlife Trust}which is represented in {New Lanark }by a full time warden assisted by a number of staff usually employed on a seasonal basis.The main concern of the { {Scottish Wildlife Trust } is the maintenance of the {Woodland and {Wildlife} in the area around the village of {New Lanark}.The {Scottish {Wildlife Trust }have a centre down at{ {New Lanark,}which is open to visitors and in the summer months courses are run for adults and children to make them more aware of their ecological heritage.
